name: Account Health Analyzer Agent
description: Analyzes combined Dynamics and external data to assess account health (risk, opportunity).

authSchemes.description: No authentication required for this agent.

skills.name: Analyze Account Health
skills.description: Calculates risk, opportunity, and engagement levels based on input data.

dynamics_data.description: The structured data fetched by the Dynamics Data Fetcher.

external_data.description: The structured data fetched by the External Data Enricher.

account_analysis.description: A dictionary containing the calculated health scores/levels.

analysis_summary.description: Brief text summary of the analysis.
